# ml-navigation-config

## Description
This module contains auto-updateable configurations for the Mercado Libre navigation.
It is based on `frontend-config-factory`, please read the [Getting started documentation](https://furydocs.io/frontend-config-factory/guide/#/) for further information on how to use it.

## Procedimiento para probar
Sobre cualquier scope de test agregar un header x-ml-navigation-config-environment:<version a probar>
